short_description.en: No-cost virtual or in-person home energy assessment.
100% of total install cost of an air source heat pump (partial or whole home) for income-qualified residents.
100% coverage for an in-person or virtual home energy assessment.
100% coverage for approved insulation improvements after receiving a home energy assessment.
100% coverage for approved insulation improvements after receiving a home energy assessment.
75% off approved insulation and air sealing improvements after receiving a home energy assessment.
Free energy assessment for residents with electricity or oil heating systems. Required to receive rebates from BELD.
Free home energy assessment.
$100 rebate for EnergyStar certified heat pump clothes dryer.
$750/ton rebate up to $4,500 for ducted or ductless heat pumps. Gas heating customers only.
$1,250/ton rebate up to $7,500 for ducted or ductless heat pumps. Non-gas heating customers only.
Up to $500 rebate for electric induction range/cooktop, depending on fuel switching. National Grid gas customers ineligible.
Up to $500 rebate for a heat pump water heater, depending on fuel switching. National Grid gas customers ineligible.
$100 rebate for EnergyStar certified smart thermostat.
$250 rebate for a level 2 electric vehicle charger. Must enroll in managed charging.
50% up to $2,500 for weatherization measures. National Grid gas customers ineligible.
100% coverage for insulation and air sealing upgrades, plus a $500 bonus, when partial-home heat pumps are installed within 6 months.
Up to 100% coverage for air sealing upgrades made after receiving a Home Energy Assessment.
100% coverage for Knob & Tube  and Vermiculite Mitigation (if barrier to accessing insulation/air sealing incentive) for income-eligible customers.
Up to $7,000 rebate for Knob & Tube and Vermiculite Mitigation (if barrier to accessing insulation/air sealing incentive).
$75 rebate per window when you upgrade your single-pane windows to ENERGY STAR "Most Efficient" certified windows.
100% coverage for a partial-home air source heat pump. Available for income eligible residents.
100% coverage for a whole-home air source heat pump. Available for income eligible residents.
100% coverage for a whole-home air to water heat pump. Available for income eligible residents.
$16,000 rebate per home for installing a partial-home air source heat pump.
$16,000 rebate per home for installing a whole-home air source heat pump.
$25,000 rebate per home for installing a whole-home ground source heat pump.
$25,000 rebate per home for installing a partial-home ground source heat pump.
$16,000 rebate per home for a whole-home air to water heat pump.
$1,250/ton rebate, up to $10,000 for a partial-home air source heat pump.
$3,000/ton rebate, up to $10,000 for a whole-home air source heat pump.
$2,000/ton rebate for a partial-home ground source heat pump.
$15,000 rebate per home for a whole-home ground source heat pump.
$3,000/ton rebate, up to $10,000 for a whole-home air to water heat pump.
100% off a replacement window air conditioner if current appliances are inefficient.
$40 rebate for a room air conditioner.
100% off of a programmable, WIFI, or smart thermostat for income eligible residents.
$25/unit rebate for a 7-day programmable thermostat, up to 3 units.
$100/unit rebate for smart thermostats, up to 3 units.
$500 rebate per indoor integrated control unit when you install an integrated control with an existing air source heat pump system (up to 3 units).
$750 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$750 rebate for a heat pump water heater (120 volt/15 amp circuit).
$1,500 rebate for a heat pump water heater split-system.
$500 rebate for replacing a natural gas or propane stove with an induction stove.
Up to $75 rebate for a battery-powered electric lawnmower.
Up to $30 rebate for a battery-powered electric leaf blower.
Up to $30 rebate for a battery-powered chainsaw.
100% coverage for an ENERGY STAR certified clothes dryer.
$50 rebate for purchasing an ENERGY STAR certified clothes dryer.
$200 rebate for purchasing a heat pump clothes dryer.
100% coverage for an ENERGY STAR certified clothes washer.
Up to $150 rebate for purchasing an ENERGY STAR certified clothes washer.
100% coverage for high-efficiency shower fixtures.
100% coverage for faucet aerators.
Discounted Marketplace Price for thermostatic shutoff valves, high-efficiency shower fixtures, and faucet aerators.
100% coverage for Tier 1 or Tier 2 advanced power strips.
Discounted Marketplace Price for Tier 1 or 2 advanced power strips.
Up to $1,400 rebate for wiring or panel upgrade needed to install an EV charging station.
$1,400 rebate for wiring or panel upgrade needed to install an EV charging station, plus an added discount rate for LIHEAP/SNAP program participants.
Up to $700 in rebates for EV charging wiring upgrades. Extra incentives for customers enrolled in the Discount Rate or living in EJ neighborhoods.
Up to $2,000 rebate for EV charger installation for discount rate customers or residents of environmental justice communities.
Earn up to $50 off your energy bill by participating in the Off-Peak Charging Program.
Save $275/kW, up to $1,375 per year when installing a battery storage system enrolled in Connected Solutions.
$50 rebate for an electric clothes dryer.
$250 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$100 rebate for a smart thermostat.
$250 rebate for an induction cooktop.
Up to $75 for electric lawn equipment including lawn mowers, leaf blowers, string trimmers, and chainsaws.
Up to 50% of job cost or $1,000, for weatherization measures recommended by an energy audit.
No cost heat air source heat pump for income-qualified customers after a home energy audit.
Free home energy assessment for all residential customers.
Free home energy audit for residential customers.
75% of weatherization plus 100% of air sealing, up to $10,000 rebate for residential customers.
100% of weatherization plus 100% of air sealing, up to $10,000 rebate for residential customers.
$1,250/ton rebate up to $10,000 for an air source heat pump for residential customers.
$1,250/ton rebate up to $16,000 for an air source heat pump for income-qualified residential customers.
Up to $10,000 rebate for a ground source heat pump for residential customers.
Up to $15,000 rebate for a ground source heat pump for income-qualified residential customers.
$100 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$25 rebate for an electric clothes dryer.
$100 rebate for an electric riding mower and and $50 rebate for an electric push mower.
$50 rebate for a smart thermostat, maximum 2.
$450 rebate for a new or used electric vehicle, maximum 2 rebates per household.
$300 rebate for a level 2 EV charger purchase and installation.
Free home energy audit for residential customers.
$500 rebate for an air source heat pump.
Up to $300 rebate for a heat pump water heater, depending on size.
$150 rebate for a heat pump clothes dryer.
$200 rebate for an electric induction range.
$25 rebate for a smart thermostat.
Up to $200 bill credit for an electric riding lawn mower, $100 for a push mower $25 for a hedge trimmer, and $25 for a leaf blower.
50% rebate of weatherization costs up to $1,000 including insulation and air sealing for residential customers, after a free energy audit.
$300/ton rebate for ducted or ductless air source heat pump. Adder of $300 if replacing old system.
$300 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$50 rebate for an electric clothes dryer.
$50 rebate for a smart thermostat.
$250 rebate for a level 2 EV charger.
$100 rebate for electric push mowers, $40 for hedge trimmers and chain saws, and $30 for leaf blowers.
Free energy audit for residential customers who do not use natural gas for heating.
50% rebate up to $1,000 for insulation measures identified by a home energy audit, for customers not using natural gas heating.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for insulation measures identified by a home energy audit, for income-qualified customers not using natural gas heating.
50% rebate up to $500 for air sealing for customers not using natural gas heating.
100% rebate up to $750 for air sealing for income-qualified customers not using natural gas heating.
Up to $10,000 rebate for whole-home air source heat pump for customers not using natural gas heating.
Up to $15,000 rebate for whole-home air source heat pump for income-qualified customers not using natural gas heating.
$1,250/ton rebate, up to $6,000 for a partial home heat pump for customers not using gas heating.
$1,500/ton rebate, up to $7,500 for a partial home heat pump, for income-qualified customers not using gas heating.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater, not to exceed 50% of purchase price.
$75 rebate for a smart thermostat, limit of 2.
Up to $200 rebate for an electric riding lawn mower, $100 for an electric snowblower, or $100 for an electric push lawn mower.
$50 rebate for an electric rototiller, $40 for a hedge trimmer, $30 for a string trimmer, and $25 for a chain saw or leaf blower.
$1.20/watt rebate for installed solar, up to 24kW maximum.
$3,500 upfront rebate for new electric vehicles. Vehicle must be $55,000 MSRP or less.
$3,500 upfront rebate for a used electric vehicle for income-qualified customers.
$1,500 upfront bonus rebate on used or new electric vehicles for income-qualified customers.
$1,000 rebate for an air source heat pump or ductless mini-split, up to $2,000 for 2 for residential customers.
$500 bill credit for a heat pump water heater for residential customers.
$50 bill credit for a smart thermostat for residential customers.
$200 rebate for an electric riding lawn mower, $100 for a push lawn mower. Provided as a bill credit and cannot exceed 50% of purchase price.
$40 rebate for an electric leaf blower, chain saw, hedge or string trimmer. Provided as a bill credit and cannot exceed 50% of purchase price.
50% rebate up to $1,000 for insulation, after a home energy audit.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for insulation, after a home energy audit, for income-qualified customers.
50% rebate on costs for air sealing, up to $500, after an energy audit.
50% rebate on costs for air sealing, up to $750, after an energy audit, for income-qualified customers.
Up to $500/ton rebate, capped at $2,000 for ductless air source heat pumps.
Up to $750/ton rebate, capped at $3,000 for ductless air source heat pumps, for income-qualified customers.
Up to $500/ton rebate, capped at $2,500 for ducted air source heat pump systems.
Up to $750/ton rebate, capped at $3,750 for ducted air source heat pump systems, for income-qualified customers.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$750 rebate for a heat pump water heater for income-qualified customers.
$100 bill credit for a smart thermostat for income-qualified customers.
$50 bill credit for a smart thermostat.
$200 rebate for an electric riding lawn mower, $100 for a push lawn mower. Provided as a bill credit.
$300 rebate for an electric riding lawn mower, $200 for a push lawn mower for income-qualified customers. Provided as a bill credit.
$40 rebate for an electric chain saw, hedge trimmer, pressure washer, or rototiller. $30 for an electric leaf blower. Provided as a bill credit.
$80 bill credit for an electric chain saw, hedge trimmer, pressure washer, or rototiller. $60 for an electric leaf blower. Must be income-qualified.
$300 rebate for a level 2 electric vehicle charger.
$450 rebate for a level 2 electric vehicle charger for income-qualified customers.
$0.60/watt up to $15,000 for residential solar installations.
Free energy audit in which an auditor will conduct a walkthrough of your home to identify energy saving opportunities.
Rebate for 50% of the cost of a blower door test and air sealing, up to $500.
Rebate for 50% of the cost of installing duct sealing, up to $500.
Rebate for 50% of the cost of installing insulation, up to $500.
Rebate of $500/ton for an air source heat pump.
Rebate of $750/ton for a ground source heat pump.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$75 rebate for an all-in-one washer and dryer.
$50 rebate for an electric clothes dryer.
$500 rebate for a heat pump dryer.
50% rebate for a Wi-Fi enabled thermostat/HVAC control, up to $125.
$100 rebate for an induction range replacing an electric range.
$500 rebate for an induction range replacing a gas or propane range.
$500 rebate for an all-in-one washer and heat pump dryer.
$200 rebate for an EV charger for a plug-in hybrid electric vehicle with less than 15 kWh battery capacity.
$300 rebate for an EV charger for a plug-in hybrid electric vehicle with a 15 kWh battery capacity or greater.
$700 rebate for an electric vehicle charger for a fully electric vehicle.
$100 rebate for a rechargeable battery operated lawn mower.
$100 rebate for a rechargeable battery operated snow blower.
$1,000 rebate for an electric panel upgrade to a 200-amp standard or smart panel, not to exceed 50% of total costs.
$1,500 rebate for an electric panel upgrade to a 400-amp standard or smart panel, not to exceed 50% of total costs.
Free home energy audit for residential customers.
10% rebate for a high efficiency ducted air source heat pump, up to $500.
10% rebate for a ductless mini split heat pump, up to $500.
50% rebate up to $1,000 rebate for weatherization including insulation, air sealing, and blower door test, after a home energy audit.
$1,500/ton rebate, up to $6,000, for an air source heat pump, $500 bonus for switching from delivered fuels.
50% rebate up to $6,000 for an ENERGY STAR ground source heat pump.
50% rebate up to $75 for a smart thermostat.
$750 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$200 rebate for a heat pump clothes dryer.
$300 rebate for an electric riding mower, and $50 rebates (each) for electric push mowers and other yard equipment.
Up to $400 rebate for a level 2 electric vehicle charger.
Free home energy audit for residential customers.
50% rebate up to $500 rebate for weatherization including insulation, air sealing, and blower door test, after a home energy audit.
$500/ton rebate for an air source heat pump, limit 3 tons.
$750/ton rebate for a ground source heat pump, limit 3 tons.
50% rebate up to $125 for an ENERGY STAR smart thermostat.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$500 rebate for an all-in-one washer and heat pump dryer.
$500 rebate for a heat pump clothes dryer.
$500 rebate for an induction range when replacing gas/propane.
$100 rebate for an induction range when replacing electric.
$100/kWh rebate for installation of a residential battery system, with enrollment in the Connected Homes program.
Up to $700 rebate for a level 2 electric charger, enrolled in the NextZero Scheduled Charging Program.
